document.docAuthor: Pleijel, Fredrik, Rouse, Greg W., Sundkvist, Tobias & Nygren, Arne
document.docOrigin: Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society (Zool. J. Linn. Soc.) 165 (3)
document.docTitle: Neogyptis fauchaldi Pleijel & Rouse & Sundkvist & Nygren 2012, SP. NOV.
document.masterDocTitle: A partial revision of Gyptis (Gyptini, Ophiodrominae, Hesionidae, Aciculata, Annelida), with descriptions of a new tribe, a new genus and five new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A partial revision of Gyptis (Gyptini, Ophiodrominae, Hesionidae, Aciculata, Annelida), with descriptions of a new tribe, a new genus and five new species
Zoological Journal of the Linnean Society

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality:
Belize , Carrie Bow Cay , 16°48.162′N , 88°04.913′W ,
1 m
, sand
.
Etymology: Named after maestro Kristian Fauchald.

caption.paragraph:
Figure 6.
Neogyptis fauchaldi
sp. nov.
, dorsal view of live relaxed female paratype (SIO-BIC A2490) from Carrie Bow Cay, Belize, 4.6 mm long excluding cirri.

Figure 7.
Neogyptis fauchaldi
sp. nov.
, scanning electron microscopy photographs of specimens from the type locality. A, anterior end, dorsal view. B, anterior end, ventral view. C, anterior end, right side. D, median parapodia, anterodorsal view. E, median parapodia, right side, ventral view. F, posterior end, ventral view. Scale bars: A, B, C, E = 100 Mm, D = 50 Mm, F = 60 Mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Biology: Mature specimens observed both in May and November. Mature eggs weak pink, size 80 Mm. The sperm of
N. fauchaldi
sp. nov. , appears to be that of an animal with broadcast spawning. It has a spheri-
